decks.notes: The main focus of this Mono Black Aggro deck is to quickly establish board presence with aggressive creatures like Bloodsoaked Champion, Knight of the Ebon Legion, and Scrapheap Scrounger, while using disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to control the game. The inclusion of cards like Smuggler's Copter and Castle Locthwain provide additional card advantage and resiliency. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a mix of evasive threats and removal spells to maintain pressure and close out the game efficiently.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells, utilizing cards like Bloodsoaked Champion, Knight of the Ebon Legion, and Murderous Rider. The deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent by utilizing cards like Rankle, Master of Pranks and Smuggler's Copter for added utility and card advantage. With a focus on early aggression and disruption, this Mono Black Aggro deck aims to control the board and close out games quickly.

The main concept of this deck is to put pressure on the opponent by playing aggressive creatures and controlling the board with removal spells. By using efficient creatures like Knight of the Ebon Legion and Gifted Aetherborn, along with disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push, the deck aims to maintain a strong board presence while draining the opponent's life total with Gray Merchant of Asphodel. Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord provides additional value and synergy with vampire creatures, making it an efficient mono black aggro deck.

The deck focuses on aggressive plays, using low-cost creatures and disruptive spells to quickly reduce the opponent's life total. It aims to control the board and pressure the opponent with creatures like Knight of the Ebon Legion and Rankle, Master of Pranks. The inclusion of cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push allows for disruption and removal of key threats. The deck also utilizes Castle Locthwain and Mutavault for card advantage and additional creature threats. Overall, the deck is designed to overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures and disruption spells.

This Izzet Control deck focuses on card advantage, efficient removal, and powerful threats like Arclight Phoenix and Thing in the Ice. The deck utilizes spells that can be cast at instant speed to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. By combining card draw with powerful creatures that can quickly close out the game, the deck aims to outvalue and out tempo the opponent. The mana base is focused on enabling casting both blue and red spells consistently to support the control strategy.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly and aggressively deal damage to the opponent by playing efficient and powerful red creatures and spells. By using cards like Earthshaker Khenra, Ahn-Crop Crasher, and Glorybringer, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize. Combining these creatures with burn spells like Wild Slash and Cut / Ribbons, the deck can push through damage and secure a victory. The deck also includes ramp with cards like Burning-Tree Emissary and Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx to help cast its high-cost threats.

The main focus of this Pioneer 1 vs 1 deck is to establish early board presence with aggressive creatures like Knight of the Ebon Legion and Bloodsoaked Champion, while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Rankle, Master of Pranks. The deck also includes efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Murderous Rider to control the board. The inclusion of Smuggler's Copter adds additional card advantage and evasion to the deck, while Castle Locthwain and Mutavault provide additional utility. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast threats and disruption.

This deck focuses on quickly turning small artifacts into powerful threats by animating them or equipping them with powerful artifacts like Ghostfire Blade. By using cards like Smuggler's Copter and Bomat Courier to keep up the pressure and draw cards, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy. The inclusion of counterspells like Metallic Rebuke helps to protect your threats and maintain tempo. Overall, the deck aims to quickly establish a board presence and disrupt the opponent's game plan while dealing significant damage each turn.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with mana dorks like Llanowar Elves and Elvish Mystic, as well as Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx, to power out big threats like Voracious Hydra and Walking Ballista. The deck also utilizes devotion to green to make use of powerful green planeswalkers like Vivien, Arkbow Ranger and Nissa, Who Shakes the World. By ramping up quickly and overwhelming the opponent with large threats, this deck aims to put pressure on the opponent and secure a fast victory.

The key concept of this deck is to ramp up mana quickly using green spells and lands, while controlling the opponent's resources through hand disruption and removal spells. The main win condition is to generate a board of zombie tokens with Field of the Dead, while also utilizing powerful creatures like Tireless Tracker and Elvish Rejuvenator to maintain card advantage. The deck focuses on slowing down the opponent's game plan and out-valuing them in the mid to late game with a mixture of land drops, removal spells, and threats.

This deck focuses on utilizing green mana symbols to ramp up quickly and play powerful green creatures and planeswalkers. With cards like Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx and Nissa, Who Shakes the World, the goal is to generate large amounts of mana to quickly overwhelm opponents with big creatures like Voracious Hydra and Walking Ballista. The deck also includes cards like Once Upon a Time for consistency and Shapers' Sanctuary for protection. Castle Garenbrig helps with additional ramp, and Vivien, Arkbow Ranger provides removal and card advantage.

This deck focuses on a fast-paced aggressive strategy using low-cost creatures and disruptive spells to pressure the opponent early on. Utilizing cards like Knight of the Ebon Legion and Smuggler's Copter, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push. The inclusion of cards like Scrapheap Scrounger and Murderous Rider provide additional threats and removal options to maintain pressure on the opponent. The deck's main goal is to win the game as quickly as possible through relentless aggression.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana and play powerful green creatures to overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing cards like Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx and The Great Henge, the deck aims to create a strong board presence and generate massive amounts of mana to play big threats like Ghalta, Primal Hunger. Cards like Steel Leaf Champion and Voracious Hydra provide additional pressure while Nissa, Who Shakes the World can further accelerate mana production. Overall, the deck's goal is to be aggressive and dominate the battlefield with its devotion to green creatures.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana with mana dorks and Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx, and then play powerful green creatures to overwhelm the opponent. Creatures with +1/+1 counters synergy like Voracious Hydra, Verdurous Gearhulk, and Walking Ballista are crucial in this aggressive strategy, along with support cards like Hardened Scales and Winding Constrictor. The planeswalker Vivien, Arkbow Ranger and Nissa, Voice of Zendikar provide additional support and synergy with the deck's overall strategy.

This deck revolves around using a diverse range of multicolored spells to control the game while setting up for powerful plays with Niv-Mizzet Reborn. The deck includes various removal spells, card draw, and versatile creatures to handle different situations. With access to five different colors of mana, the deck can adapt to different threats and strategies, making it a flexible and resourceful control deck. By utilizing Niv-Mizzet Reborn's ability to draw cards and put threats on the board, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver opponents in a 1 vs 1 format.

The main point of this deck is to control the game through ramping up mana with green cards like Elvish Rejuvenator and Arboreal Grazer, while also having control options with cards like Supreme Verdict and Teferi, Time Raveler. The deck also includes cards like Field of the Dead for extra value and Ugin, the Spirit Dragon for a powerful win condition. The deck aims to maintain control of the game through efficient mana ramp and powerful control spells until it can overwhelm the opponent with its late-game threats.
